name: E-commerce Platform
template: Build a modern e-commerce web application with: Product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, payment integration, order management, admin dashboard, and mobile responsiveness. Include SEO optimization and performance monitoring.

name: Task Management App
template: Create a collaborative task management web app featuring: Project boards, task assignment, progress tracking, team collaboration, file attachments, notifications, and real-time updates. Ensure cross-platform compatibility.

name: Social Media Dashboard
template: Develop a social media management dashboard with: Multi-platform posting, analytics visualization, content scheduling, engagement tracking, team collaboration, and automated reporting features.

name: Learning Management System
template: Build an LMS platform including: Course creation, student enrollment, progress tracking, assessments, certificates, discussion forums, and instructor tools. Focus on accessibility and mobile learning.

name: Real Estate Portal
template: Create a real estate web platform with: Property listings, advanced search filters, virtual tours, mortgage calculator, agent profiles, lead management, and map integration. Optimize for local SEO.

name: Healthcare Patient Portal
template: Develop a secure patient portal featuring: Appointment scheduling, medical records access, prescription management, telemedicine integration, billing, and HIPAA-compliant messaging.

name: Financial Dashboard
template: Build a financial analytics dashboard with: Portfolio tracking, market data visualization, risk analysis, automated reporting, alerts, and integration with banking APIs. Ensure data security and compliance.

name: Event Management Platform
template: Create an event management web app including: Event creation, ticket sales, attendee management, check-in system, networking features, feedback collection, and analytics reporting.
